external_references.description: GReAT. (2014, December 10). Cloud Atlas: RedOctober APT is back in style. Retrieved May 8, 2020.

description: [Inception](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0100) has maintained persistence by modifying Registry run key value HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\.(Citation: Kaspersky Cloud Atlas December 2014)
